summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Badminton Tournament Management App - Teams and Players CRUD functionality. All 16 backend API tests passed. All frontend CRUD operations (create, edit, delete teams/players) working correctly with proper confirmation dialogs.

issues: Duplicate teams with same pool number (X1) exist in database - legacy data issue, not a code bug

critical_code_review_comments: Pool selection in Create Team dialog may not update properly when clicking Pool Y - the team was created in Pool X instead of Y. This could be a Select component interaction issue.
Database has duplicate teams with same pool numbers (multiple X1 teams) - consider adding unique constraint on pool+pool_number combination
seed_data_creation: Created and cleaned up test teams and players during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All CRUD operations for Teams and Players are working. Backend has 16 passing tests covering admin login, teams CRUD, players CRUD, and player limits. Frontend tested via Playwright - login, navigation, create/edit/delete teams, add/edit/delete players all working with proper confirmation dialogs. Note: Database has some legacy duplicate teams with same pool numbers (X1).
